import React,{Component}from"react";// import moment from 'moment';
import"./Timer.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class CountDown extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.count=this.count.bind(this);this.state={days:0,minutes:0,hours:0,secounds:0,time_up:""};this.x=null;this.deadline=null;}count(){var now=new Date().getTime();var t=this.deadline-now;var dd=Math.floor(t/(1000*60*60*24));var hh=Math.floor(t%(1000*60*60*24)/(1000*60*60));var mm=Math.floor(t%(1000*60*60)/(1000*60));var ss=Math.floor(t%(1000*60)/1000);var days=dd<10?"0"+dd:dd;var hours=hh<10?"0"+hh:hh;var minutes=mm<10?"0"+mm:mm;var seconds=ss<10?"0"+ss:ss;this.setState({days,minutes,hours,seconds});if(t<0){clearInterval(this.x);this.setState({days:0,minutes:0,hours:0,seconds:0,time_up:"TIME IS UP"});}}componentDidMount(){this.deadline=new Date("Oct 08, 2022 21:00:00").getTime();this.x=setInterval(this.count,1000);}render(){const{days,seconds,hours,minutes}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"countdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"day",children:days}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text",children:"Days"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"hour",children:hours}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text",children:"Hours"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"minute",children:minutes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text",children:"Minutes"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"second",children:seconds}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text",children:"Seconds"})]})})]});}}export default CountDown;
